mapper.select: SELECT TS.SHIPPING_NO shippingNo, TS.PORT_NO portNo, TM.USER_NO userNo, TM.USER_ID username, TM.NICKNAME nickname, SHIPPING_TITLE shippingTitle, ALLOW_PEPLE_NO allowPepleNo, PRICE price, ADDRESS address, SHIPPING_CREATE_DATE shippingCreateDate, ROUND(avgRating, 2) avgRating, imageNo, imagePath, imageChangeName, imageOriginName FROM TB_SHIPPING TS JOIN TB_MEMBER TM ON (TS.USER_NO = TM.USER_NO) JOIN TB_PORT TP ON (TP.PORT_NO = TS.PORT_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AVG(RATING) AS avgRating, TS.SHIPPING_NO SHIPPING_NO FROM TB_SHIPPING_REVIEW TSR JOIN TB_SHIPPING_PLAY TSP ON (TSR.BOOK_NO = TSP.BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SHIPPING_DECIDE TSD ON (TSD.BOOK_NO = TSP.BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SHIPPING_BOOK TSB ON (TSD.BOOK_NO = TSB.BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SHIPPING TS ON (TS.SHIPPING_NO = TSB.SHIPPING_NO) GROUP BY TS.SHIPPING_NO) RA ON (RA.SHIPPING_NO = TS.SHIPPING_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TSI.IMAGE_NO imageNo, TSI.IMAGE_PATH imagePath, TSI.IMAGE_CHANGE_NAME imageChangeName, TSI.IMAGE_ORIGIN_NAME imageOriginName, TSI.REF_BOARD_NO FROM TB_SHIPPING_IMAGE TSI WHERE TSI.STATUS = 'Y' AND TSI.IMAGE_LEVEL = 1 ) IMG ON (TS.SHIPPING_NO = IMG.REF_BOARD_NO ) WHERE (TS.SHIPPING_NO IS NOT NULL OR TS.SHIPPING_NO IN (SELECT SHIPPING_NO FROM TB_SHIPPING_BOOK GROUP BY SHIPPING_NO)) AND TS.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SHIPPING_CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT TS.SHIPPING_NO shippingNo, TS.SHIPPING_TITLE shippingTitle, TS.SHIPPING_CONTENT shippingCOntent, TS.ALLOW_PEPLE_NO allowPepleNo, TS.SHIPPING_CREATE_DATE shippingCreateDate, TS.SHIPPING_MODIFY_DATE shippingModifyDate, ROUND(avgRating, 2) avgRating, ATTENTION as "attention", TS.PRICE price, TM.USER_NO userNo, TM.USER_ID username, TM.NICKNAME nickname, TM.PHONE phone, TM.EMAIL email, TSV.SHIPPING_SERVICE_NO as serviceNo, TSV.SHIPPING_SERVICE_CONTENT as serviceName, imageNo, imagePath, imageChangeName, imageOriginName, imageLevel, boardNo, TP.PORT_NO portNo, TP.ADDRESS address, TP.DETAIL_ADDRESS detailAddress, TP.LAT lat, TP.LON lon, TP.SPOT_CODE spotCode, TF.FISH_NO fishNo, TF.FISH_NAME fishName FROM TB_SHIPPING TS JOIN TB_MEMBER TM ON (TS.USER_NO = TM.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SHIPPING_BOOK TSB ON(TS.SHIPPING_NO = TSB.SHIPPING_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SHIPPING_DECIDE TSD ON (TSB.BOOK_NO = TSD.BOOK_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SHIPPING_PLAY TSP ON (TSD.BOOK_NO = TSP.BOOK_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_PORT TP ON (TS.PORT_NO = TP.PORT_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SHIPPING_SERVICE TSS ON(TS.SHIPPING_NO = TSS.SHIPPING_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SERVICE TSV ON(TSS.SHIPPING_SERVICE = TSV.SHIPPING_SERVICE_NO ) LEFT JOIN TB_ENABLE_FISH TEF ON (TS.SHIPPING_NO = TEF.SHIPPING_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_FISH TF ON (TF.FISH_NO = TEF.FISH_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TSI.IMAGE_NO imageNo, TSI.IMAGE_PATH imagePath, TSI.IMAGE_CHANGE_NAME imageChangeName, TSI.IMAGE_ORIGIN_NAME imageOriginName, TSI.REF_BOARD_NO boardNo, TSI.IMAGE_LEVEL imageLevel FROM TB_SHIPPING_IMAGE TSI WHERE TSI.STATUS = 'Y' ) IMG ON (TS.SHIPPING_NO = boardNo ) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AVG(RATING) AS avgRating, TS.SHIPPING_NO SHIPPING_NO FROM TB_SHIPPING_REVIEW TSR JOIN TB_SHIPPING_PLAY TSP ON (TSR.BOOK_NO = TSP.BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SHIPPING_DECIDE TSD ON (TSD.BOOK_NO = TSP.BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SHIPPING_BOOK TSB ON (TSD.BOOK_NO = TSB.BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_SHIPPING TS ON (TS.SHIPPING_NO = TSB.SHIPPING_NO) GROUP BY TS.SHIPPING_NO) RA ON (RA.SHIPPING_NO = TS.SHIPPING_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(SHIPPING_NO) ATTENTION, TA.SHIPPING_NO FROM TB_SHIPPING_ATTENTION TA GROUP BY SHIPPING_NO) TSA ON (TSA.SHIPPING_NO = TS.SHIPPING_NO) WHERE TS.SHIPPING_NO = #{shippingNo}

SELECT TF.FISH_NO fishNo, FISH_NAME fishName, EXPLAINATION, START_OUT_OF_SEASON startOutOfSeason, END_OUT_OF_SEASON endOutOfSeason, NOTE note, DEFAULT_SIZE defaultSize FROM TB_FISH_CONTENT TFC JOIN TB_FISH TF ON (TFC.FISH_NO = TF.FISH_NO) WHERE TF.FISH_NO = #{fishNo}

SELECT PORT_NO portNo, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS detailAddress FROM TB_PORT
WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
WHERE DETAIL_ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
SELECT SHIPPING_NO shippingNo, USER_NO userNo FROM TB_SHIPPING WHERE SHIPPING_NO = ${shippingNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SHIPPING SET SHIPPING_TITLE = #{shippingTitle}, SHIPPING_CONTENT = #{shippingContent}, ALLOW_PEPLE_NO = #{allowPepleNo}, PRICE = #{price}, PORT_NO = #{port.portNo} WHERE SHIPPING_NO = #{shippingNo}
